body: I'm sorry but does the artist has some sort of wierd fetish on watching people getting spanked expecially in case of female characters here? No matter which one of the artist's work that I see, they all have spanking in them. As much as I appreciate the drawing, the spanking is a big turn off for me.

These are not finished books. These are the commissions in the Fanbox or Patreon. It belongs to each subscriber. The uploader should be a young sponsor, He was unaware of the serious consequences of doing so. We ask you to delete the content about Huaca and preserve new life for the source of creation.
Man. This tide of Huaca garbage is the first time I decided to look into blacklisting artists I don't like. Lucky for me you can blacklist ANY tag it seems.
